entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 04:53 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure: 97.6 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -25.9°C
Wind: W 41 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
